definition: alcohol/wine with high alcohol content/rich/pure/good wine/sterols

pinyin: yan2 pi2 zhi4 lei4 gu4 chun2

sentences.english: VOICE: So it sounds as if anabolic steroids can be very destructive.
sentences.chinese: 所以，听起来合成代谢类固醇的破坏性会很大。

sentences.english: Authorities say they discovered prescription steroids in the home of pro wrestler Chris Benoit.
sentences.chinese: 本诺伊特的家中发现了处方类固醇。

sentences.english: And the use of cocaine, hallucinogens, steroids, and alcohol by America's youth are all on the decline.
sentences.chinese: 可卡因，迷幻药，类固醇和酒精的使用也前面下降。

sentences.english: No wonder white-space is being referred to as “Wi-Fi on steroids”.
sentences.chinese: 难怪白色空间被称为“打了类固醇的WIFI”。

sentences.english: Most steroid users consider these effects as an inconvenience.
sentences.chinese: 而大部分的类固醇使用者都认为这些影响微不足道。

sentences.english: Corticosteroids and their synthetic analogs are used to treat rheumatism and other inflammatory ailments.
sentences.chinese: 皮质类固醇及其合成物可用来治疗风湿病和其它炎症。

sentences.english: Therapy with corticosteroid hormone showed good effect for this patient.
sentences.chinese: 皮质类固醇激素治疗后疗效显著。

sentences.english: It was found to be more anabolic than anabolic steroids without any of the side effects.
sentences.chinese: 它被发现的合成代谢类固醇相比没有任何副作用。

sentences.english: All she knew about anabolic steroids was that they were illegal.
sentences.chinese: 而对于合成类固醇，她只知道它是违法的。

sentences.english: Features of Cushing's syndrome may also be found in women who are taking chronic steroid therapy.
sentences.chinese: 长期服用类固醇治疗可能有柯兴氏综合征的特点。
长期使用类固醇类药物。

sentences.english: And he did it all without steroids.
sentences.chinese: 他没有借助类固醇便办到了。

sentences.english: During treatment, a mixture of a corticosteroid and a local anesthetic was injected intra-articularly.
sentences.chinese: 关节内注射皮质类固醇激素和局部麻醉药。

sentences.english: You may need a stronger prescription-strength product or steroid lotion.
sentences.chinese: 您可能需要一个更强有力的产品或类固醇洗剂。

sentences.english: You may need to use a topical corticosteroid to treat inflamed areas.
sentences.chinese: 您可能需要使用皮质类固醇的话题治疗发炎的地区。
举重选手常服用合成类固醇。

definition: glucocorticosteroid (corticosteroid hormone secreted by the adrenal cortex)
testosterone/also written 睾甾酮[gao1 zai1 tong2]
testosterone/abbr. for 睾丸甾酮[gao1 wan2 zai1 tong2]
